mcq.statement: The legal theory of rights holds that?

options.a: The rights are granted to the individual by the state but it cannot take them back without the consent of the majority
options.b: The rights are granted to the individual by the state and can be tak back by it
options.c: The state does not grant rights to the individual but can curtail his rights state does not grant rights to the maividual but can curtail his rights
options.d: The state neither grants rights to the individual nor can restrict them
